result.title: Project website
result.description: The ODIN website will be launched at the start of the project The website will provide detailed information on the aims objectives consortium work processes and the current state of the project It will provide information for all interested parties and the general public The website will offer the opportunity to register for a periodical newsletter that provides updates on the project state and further information related to the ODIN project The strong potential of social media for exposure of the project will be realised by setting up the most relevant channels and distributing content
